content: PFF Panel 3 Investments Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019What should my first investment be? Reits? Approximately 10k to invest3 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Make sure you have your basics ready first. Have an emergency fund of around 6 months expenses, insurances all done and then do your research which investment suits you the most. Dont follow the crowd, buy what you think is good based on ur research.0 comments1

Charmaine Ng, The Code Breaker at @ Every Chye Peng StallLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019It boils down to your preference mode of management; are you into daily monitoring, do you like to pick your own stocks, how much can you contribute and at what frequency. Personally I don't monitor on daily basis so robo adviser is a better option for me.That said, due diligence on your investment is still required. :)0 comments1
EErLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Invest in yourself0 comments0
